title: Datte, Oishii no ga Warui.
description:
Collection of Stories:

1. Smoking Room

2. Breaktime in Reverie: Suzuki, who wakes up as usual, comes face to face with a stranger who says “I was just eating your dream”. This man, who shows up from time to time, now makes him crazy disgusting coffee. But being told his dreams are beautiful and delicious, Suzuki’s heart melts bit by bit.

3. Twisted Shoe Sole

4. Nonfiction Red

5. Dancing on your Desk
